comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Members of a delegation of California Shriners visiting New York City, May 8, 1914:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5415570595/in/photostream/]

The California Shriners gave a concert in City Hall Park:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5209399484/]

Rain dampened the California Shriners' concert that day:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5208801667/in/photostream/]
